summary: The student dashboard was enhanced with 'Upcoming Assignments' and 'Upcoming Exams' sections, and 'Recently Accessed' was renamed to 'My Courses' with updated icons. The parent dashboard was improved by adding 'Notifications & Announcements' and 'Upcoming Events/Calendar' sections, and the 'Children's Progress' section now displays more detailed information using individual child cards. All changes were linted and no errors were found.
current_status: Student and Parent dashboards have been updated to include more comprehensive information and improved UI elements.
